mod.name: Bartender
mod.description: Adds Bartender as a playable class.

cards.name: Bottle
cards.description:
Deal 3 Damage and apply 3 stacks of bartender:Bleed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bottle+
cards.description:
Deal 4 Damage and apply 5 stacks of bartender:Bleed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dodge
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible, add a bartender:Tired to your Draw pile. bartender:Flip: bartender:Dart.

cards.name: Dodge+
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible. bartender:Flip: bartender:Dart.

cards.name: Drop
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage to all Enemies.
bartender:Flip: bartender:Soar.

cards.name: Drop+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage to all Enemies.
bartender:Flip: upgraded bartender:Soar.

cards.name: Final Heaven
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 7 times.
Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Final Heaven+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage 7 times.
Exhaust. Ethereal.

cards.name: Hailstorm
cards.description:
Deal 16 Damage to all Enemies.
Gain bartender:Frozen.
bartender:Flip: bartender:Glacier.

cards.name: Hailstorm+
cards.description:
Deal 21 Damage to all Enemies.
Gain bartender:Frozen.
bartender:Flip: upgraded bartender:Glacier.

cards.name: Haymaker
cards.description:
Deal 30 Damage.
bartender:Flip: bartender:Windup.

cards.name: Haymaker+
cards.description:
Deal 36 Damage.
bartender:Flip: upgraded bartender:Windup

cards.name: Jab
cards.description:
Deal 3 Damage.
Exhaust.
bartender:Combo: Upgrade Card.

cards.name: Jab+
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage.
Exhaust.
bartender:Combo: Upgrade Card.

cards.name: Sting
cards.description:
Gain 2 bartender:Flow.
bartender:Combo: Apply bartender:Gash on attack.
bartender:Flip: bartender:Float.

cards.name: Sting+
cards.description:
Gain 3 bartender:Flow.
bartender:Combo: Apply bartender:Gash on attack.
bartender:Flip: upgraded bartender:Float.

cards.name: Tired
cards.description: bartender:Heavy. Ethereal.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Somersault
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
bartender:Dredge: 2.

cards.name: Somersault+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
bartender:Dredge: 3.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Ball Of Ice
cards.description:
Gain bartender:Frozen.
Ethereal, Exhaust.

cards.name: Ball Of Ice+
cards.description:
Gain bartender:Frozen.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bitters
cards.description:
Gain 2 bartender:Flow when drawn.
Unplayable.

cards.name: Bitters+
cards.description:
Gain 3 bartender:Flow when drawn.
Unplayable.

cards.name: Center Self
cards.description:
Gain 7 block.
bartender:Combo: Apply 3 stacks of bartender:Bleed on attack.

cards.name: Center Self+
cards.description:
Gain 10 block.
bartender:Combo: Apply 5 stacks of bartender:Bleed on attack.

cards.name: Cross
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Apply Weak on attack.

cards.name: Cross+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage.
bartender:Combo 2: Apply Weak on attack.

cards.name: Dancing Jab
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 3 times.
bartender:Heavy.

cards.name: Dancing Jab+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
bartender:Heavy.

cards.name: Dragonkick
cards.description: Deal 6 Damage. Apply 5 stacks of bartender:Bleed.

cards.name: Dragonkick+
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage. Apply 7 stacks of bartender:Bleed.

cards.name: Fading Blow
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage.
Gain 4 bartender:Ebb.

cards.name: Fading Blow+
cards.description:
Deal 7 Damage.
Gain 5 bartender:Ebb.

cards.name: Feint
cards.description:
Gain 6 block.
bartender:Combo: Apply a stack of Vulnerable on attack.

cards.name: Feint+
cards.description:
Gain 9 block.
bartender:Combo 2: Apply a stack of Vulnerable on attack.

cards.name: Foot-Thrust
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Double Block generated.

cards.name: Foot-Thrust+
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Double Block generated.

cards.name: Free Pour
cards.description:
Gain 4 bartender:Ebb when drawn.
Unplayable.

cards.name: Free Pour+
cards.description:
Gain 6 bartender:Ebb when drawn.
Unplayable.

cards.name: Greased Lightning
cards.description: Draw a Card. Exhaust.

cards.name: Greased Lightning+
cards.description: Draw 2 Cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Hook
cards.description:
Deal 7 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Apply Vulnerable on attack.

cards.name: Hook+
cards.description:
Deal 10 Damage.
bartender:Combo 2: Apply Vulnerable on attack.

cards.name: On The Rocks
cards.description: On Draw: Gain bartender:Frozen. bartender:Heavy.

cards.name: On The Rocks+
cards.description: On Draw: Gain bartender:Frozen and 2 bartender:Ebb. bartender:Heavy.

cards.name: Pony Shot
cards.description: On Draw: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Unplayable.

cards.name: Pony Shot+
cards.description: On Draw: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy. Unplayable.

cards.name: Power Up Punch
cards.description:
Gain 1 bartender:Flow.
Deal 7 Damage.

cards.name: Power Up Punch+
cards.description:
Gain 2 bartender:Flow.
Deal 9 Damage.

cards.name: Press Forward
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
bartender:Combo 2: Apply Weak on attack.

cards.name: Press Forward+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
bartender:Combo 3: Apply Weak on attack.

cards.name: Ripple
cards.description:
Gain 4 bartender:Ebb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ripple+
cards.description:
Gain 6 bartender:Ebb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scoop
cards.description:
bartender:Dredge.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scoop+
cards.description: bartender:Dredge.

cards.name: Snap Punch
cards.description:
Deal 7 Damage.
bartender:Combo 2: Upgrade Card.

cards.name: Snap Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 10 Damage.
bartender:Combo 3: Upgrade Card.

cards.name: Step of the Wind
cards.description:
Gain 5 bartender:Ebb.
bartender:Slip: Step of the Wind.

cards.name: Step of the Wind+
cards.description:
Gain 8 bartender:Ebb.
bartender:Slip: upgraded Step of the Wind.

cards.name: Stick and Move
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage twice.
bartender:Slip: Stick and Move.

cards.name: Stick and Move+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage twice.
bartender:Slip: upgraded Stick and Move.

cards.name: Sucker Punch
cards.description:
Deal 6 Damage.
Innate. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sucker Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
Innate. Exhaust.

cards.name: With A Twist
cards.description:
On Draw: Apply 4 stacks of Bleed to all enemies.
Unplayable.

cards.name: With A Twist+
cards.description:
On Draw: Apply 6 stacks of Bleed to all enemies.
Unplayable.

cards.name: Alacrity
cards.description:
Reduce Cost of a random card in hand to 0 for this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Alacrity+
cards.description:
Reduce Cost of a card in hand to 0 for this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Axe Heel Kick
cards.description:
Deal 7 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Double Damage.

cards.name: Axe Heel Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Double Damage.

cards.name: Bicycle Kick
cards.description:
Deal 3 Damage.
Apply 4 bartender:Bleed and a stack of bartender:Gash.

cards.name: Bicycle Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 3 Damage.
Apply 7 bartender:Bleed and a stack of bartender:Gash.

cards.name: Bloodbath
cards.description: Pass the bartender:Bleed stacks on one enemy onto all Enemies. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloodbath+
cards.description: Pass the bartender:Bleed stacks on one enemy onto all Enemies.

cards.name: Bouncer
cards.description: You may discard a card at the start of your turn. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Bouncer+
cards.description: You may discard up to 2 cards at the start of your turn. Draw that many cards.

cards.name: Coeurl Form
cards.description: When attacked, apply 3 stacks on bartender:Bleed to the attacker.

cards.name: Coeurl Form+
cards.description: When attacked, apply 4 stacks on bartender:Bleed to the attacker.

cards.name: Dart
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
bartender:Flip: bartender:Dodge.

cards.name: Dart+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
bartender:Flip: upgraded bartender:Dodge.

cards.name: Elbow Slash
cards.description:
Deal 9 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Apply 1 bartender:Gash.

cards.name: Elbow Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 11 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Apply 1 bartender:Gash.

cards.name: Fight Dirty
cards.description: Apply 2 stacks of bartender:Bleed on attack.

cards.name: Fight Dirty+
cards.description: Apply 3 stacks of bartender:Bleed on attack.

cards.name: Four Point Fury
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy Four times.
Add a bartender:Tired to the draw pile.

cards.name: Four Point Fury+
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy Four times.
Add a bartender:Tired to the draw pile.

cards.name: Glacier
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 3 stacks of bartender:Bleed back.
bartender:Flip: bartender:Hailstorm.

cards.name: Glacier+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 5 stacks of bartender:Bleed back.
bartender:Flip: upgraded bartender:Hailstorm.

cards.name: Glare
cards.description:
Exhaust.
bartender:Combo: Apply Vulnerable on attack.

cards.name: Glare+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
bartender:Combo 2: Apply Vulnerable on attack.

cards.name: Insight
cards.description:
Gain 12 bartender:Ebb.
bartender:Dredge 4.

cards.name: Insight+
cards.description:
Gain 16 bartender:Ebb.
bartender:Dredge 4.

cards.name: Meditate
cards.description: Add 2 X bartender:Alacrities to your draw pile.

cards.name: Meditate+
cards.description: Add 2 X upgraded bartender:Alacrities to your draw pile.

cards.name: Meteodrive
cards.description: Deal 4 Damage 1 to 5 times.

cards.name: Meteodrive+
cards.description: Deal 5 Damage 1 to 7 times.

cards.name: Mirage
cards.description:
Gain 7 bartender:Ebb.
bartender:Combo: Add Duplicate of Card to draw pile.

cards.name: Mirage+
cards.description:
Gain 7 bartender:Ebb.
bartender:Combo: Add Duplicate of Card to draw pile.

cards.name: On The House
cards.description:
On Draw: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand to 0 for this turn.
Unplayable, bartender:Heavy.

cards.name: On The House+
cards.description:
On Draw: Reduce Cost of a card in hand to 0 for this turn.
Unplayable, bartender:Heavy.

cards.name: Opo-Opo Form
cards.description: Deal an additional 10% damage for every card you have played this turn.

cards.name: Opo-Opo Form+
cards.description:
Deal an additional 10% damage for every card you have played this turn.
Innate.

cards.name: Perfect Balance
cards.description:
Gain 10 bartender:Ebb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Perfect Balance+
cards.description:
Gain 15 bartender:Ebb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Phantom Blow
cards.description:
Apply 6 stacks of bartender:Bleed.
Scales with Damage.

cards.name: Phantom Blow+
cards.description:
Apply 9 stacks of bartender:Bleed.
Scales with Damage.

cards.name: Raptor Form
cards.description: Gain a stack of bartender:Flow every other card played.

cards.name: Raptor Form+
cards.description:
Gain a stack of bartender:Flow every other card played.
Innate.

cards.name: RockBreaker
cards.description: Deals 14 Damage. bartender:Limitless: increase damage by 8.

cards.name: Rope a Dope
cards.description: Gain 2 bartender:Ebb when attacked.

cards.name: Rope a Dope+
cards.description: Gain 3 bartender:Ebb when attacked.

cards.name: Scowl
cards.description:
Exhaust.
bartender:Combo: Apply Weak on attack.

cards.name: Scowl+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
bartender:Combo 2: Apply Weak on attack.

cards.name: Smash 'em
cards.description: Triple the bartender:Bleed stacks an enemy has. Exhaust.

cards.name: Smash 'em+
cards.description: Triple the bartender:Bleed stacks an enemy has.

cards.name: Soar
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage to a random Enemy Twice.
bartender:Slip: bartender:Drop.

cards.name: Soar+
cards.description:
Deal 7 Damage to a random Enemy Twice.
bartender:Slip: upgraded bartender:Drop.

cards.name: StoneBreaker
cards.description: Deals 14 Damage. bartender:Limitless: increase damage by 13.

cards.name: Tornadokick
cards.description: Deal 12 Damage. Deal damage equal to the amount of bartender:Bleed stacks target has.

cards.name: Tornadokick+
cards.description: Deal 18 Damage. Deal damage equal to the amount of bartender:Bleed stacks target has.

cards.name: Training Dummy
cards.description: Add 4 bartender:Jabs to your draw pile.

cards.name: Training Dummy+
cards.description: Add 5 bartender:Jabs to your draw pile.

cards.name: Wall of Ice
cards.description:
Gain 7 bartender:Ebb.
Gain bartender:Frozen.

cards.name: Wall of Ice+
cards.description:
Gain 9 bartender:Ebb.
Gain bartender:Frozen.

cards.name: Waterkick
cards.description: Deal 8 Damage and target loses 2 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Waterkick+
cards.description: Deal 11 Damage and target loses 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Well Drinks
cards.description: Gain 4 bartender:Ebb. Put a random Unplayable Bartender Card into your hand.

cards.name: Well Drinks+
cards.description: Gain 6 bartender:Ebb. Put a random upgraded Unplayable Bartender Card into your hand.

cards.name: Be Like Water
cards.description: Block gained from Bartender cards is turned into bartender:Ebb.

cards.name: Be Like Water+
cards.description:
Block gained from Bartender cards is turned into bartender:Ebb.
Innate.

cards.name: Beat Rush
cards.description: Deal 6 Damage. Add a bartender:Jab to your hand.

cards.name: Beat Rush+
cards.description: Deal 7 Damage. Add 2 bartender:Jabs to your hand.

cards.name: Breathe Deep
cards.description: Gain 8 bartender:Ebb. Reduce the cost of a random card in hand to 0.

cards.name: Breathe Deep+
cards.description: Gain 10 bartender:Ebb. Reduce the cost of 2 random cards in hand to 0.

cards.name: Cold Blooded
cards.description: Gain 3 bartender:Flow and bartender:Frozen.

cards.name: Cold Blooded+
cards.description: Gain 5 bartender:Flow and bartender:Frozen.

cards.name: Combo Master
cards.description: bartender:Combos last for an extra card.

cards.name: Combo Master+
cards.description: bartender:Combos last for 2 extra cards.

cards.name: Dolphin Blow
cards.description:
Double bartender:Flow and deal 4 Damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dolphin Blow+
cards.description: Double bartender:Flow and deal 4 Damage.

cards.name: Float
cards.description:
Gain 4 bartender:Ebb.
Scales like Block.
bartender:Slip: bartender:Sting.

cards.name: Float+
cards.description:
Gain 6 bartender:Ebb.
Scales with block.
bartender:Slip: upgraded bartender:Sting.

cards.name: Form Shift
cards.description: Add bartender:Opo-Opo Form, bartender:Raptor Form, or bartender:Coeurl Form to hand, costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Form Shift+
cards.description: Add bartender:Opo-Opo Form, bartender:Raptor Form, or bartender:Coeurl Form to hand, costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: High Tide
cards.description:
Turn bartender:Ebb into bartender:Flow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: High Tide+
cards.description: Turn bartender:Ebb into bartender:Flow.

cards.name: Moonsault Kick
cards.description:
Deal 4 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Card Played Twice.

cards.name: Moonsault Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 6 Damage.
bartender:Combo: Card Played Twice.

cards.name: Patience
cards.description: 0 cost cards aren't discarded at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Patience+
cards.description: 0 cost cards aren't discarded at the end of your turn. Innate.

cards.name: Skim
cards.description: When you bartender:Dredge, the card(s) goes into your hand.

cards.name: Skim+
cards.description:
When you bartender:Dredge, the card(s) goes into your hand.
Innate.

cards.name: Spirits Within
cards.description: Add an bartender:Bottle to the Draw Pile whenever you draw an Unplayable Bartender card.

cards.name: Spirits Within+
cards.description: Add an bartender:Bottle to the Draw Pile whenever you draw an Unplayable Bartender card.

cards.name: Storage
cards.description: Put an bartender:Bottle in hand whenever you play a Power.

cards.name: Storage+
cards.description:
Put an bartender:Bottle in hand whenever you play a Power.
Innate.

cards.name: Top Shelf
cards.description:
Gain 2 bartender:Flow.
Add an bartender:Bottle to your hand.

cards.name: Top Shelf+
cards.description:
Gain 2 bartender:Flow.
Add 2 bartender:Bottles to your hand.

cards.name: Windup
cards.description:
bartender:Combo: Apply Vulnerable on Attack.
bartender:Slip: bartender:Haymaker.

cards.name: Windup+
cards.description:
bartender:Combo 2: Apply Vulnerable on Attack.
bartender:Slip: upgraded bartender:Haymaker.

relics.name: Sprint Shoes
relics.description: Draw a card when you play a Bartender card.

relics.name: Protect_Vest
relics.flavorText: A Nilfheim-made vest that can resist bullets.

relics.name: Coral Ring
relics.description: Ebb and Flow Decrease by 1/4 instead of 1/2 at the end of every turn.
relics.flavorText: Ring infused with the power of water.

relics.name: Cowpoke Hat
relics.description: Combos last for an extra card.

relics.name: Piano Music
relics.description: Every 25 hp lost add a Final Heaven to your hand (Costs 0, deal damage to an enemy 6 times).

relics.name: Power Wrist
relics.flavorText: A leather band that martial artists wear on their wrists.

relics.name: White Cape
relics.description: Gain a stack of Artifact every 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: Ring infused with the power of water.

relics.name: Choco Feather
relics.description: Start combat with 2 extra Jabs in hand.
relics.flavorText: A feather from a fast and cute bird.

relics.name: Silver Glasses
relics.description: Every 9 cards played make 1 card in hand free for this turn.

relics.name: Vampire_Cape
relics.description: Heal 5 hp every time an enemy dies from Bleed.
